tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transportation_emissions (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    fuel_type VARCHAR(50),
    emissions_kg INT,
    city VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE emissions_data (
  trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
  distance_travelled DECIMAL,
  carbon_emissions DECIMAL,
  trip_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE travel_strategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
  key_features TEXT,
  implementation_status BOOLEAN,
  last_update TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_emissions (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_type VARCHAR(255),
  fuel_type VARCHAR(255),
  co2_emissions DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE travel_strategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  impact_on_emissions DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE travel_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  distance_covered DECIMAL,
  travel_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE trips (
    trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mode_id INT,
    trip_date DATE NOT NULL,
    distance FLOAT NOT NULL,
    emissions FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (mode_id) REFERENCES transportation_modes(mode_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_trips (
    user_id INT,
    trip_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, trip_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (trip_id) REFERENCES trips(trip_id)
);
